$schema.description: JSON schema responsible for describing the manifest's data format and validation.
$schema.markdownDescription: JSON schema responsible for describing the manifest's data format and validation.

id.description: Unique identifier associated with the layout.
id.markdownDescription: Unique identifier associated with the layout.

Layout.description: Defines the structure of a custom layout file.
Layout.markdownDescription: Defines the structure of a custom layout file.

key.description: Unique name used to identify the layout item. When calling `setFeedback` this value should be used as the key as part of the object that represents the feedback.
key.errorMessage: String must only contain alphanumeric characters (A-z, 0-9), hyphens (-), and underscores (_)
key.markdownDescription: Unique name used to identify the layout item. When calling `setFeedback` this value should be used as the key as part of the object that represents the feedback.

rect.description: Array defining the items coordinates in the format `[x, y, width, height]`; coordinates must be within canvas size of 200 x 100, e.g. [0, 0, 200, 100]. Items with the same `zOrder` must **not** have an overlapping `rect`.
rect.markdownDescription: Array defining the items coordinates in the format `[x, y, width, height]`; coordinates must be within canvas size of 200 x 100, e.g. [0, 0, 200, 100]. Items with the same `zOrder` must **not** have an overlapping `rect`.

type.description: Type of layout item this instance represents, e.g. "pixmap", "bar", etc.
type.markdownDescription: Type of layout item this instance represents, e.g. "pixmap", "bar", etc.

bar_bg_c.description:
Bar background color represented as a named color, hexadecimal value, or gradient. Default is `darkGray`. Gradients can be defined by specifying multiple color-stops separated by commas, in the following format `[{offset}:{color}[,]]`.

**Examples:**
- "pink"
- "#204cfe" (Elgato blue)
- "0:#ff0000,0.5:yellow,1:#00ff00" (Gradient)
bar_bg_c.markdownDescription:
Bar background color represented as a named color, hexadecimal value, or gradient. Default is `darkGray`. Gradients can be defined by specifying multiple color-stops separated by commas, in the following format `[{offset}:{color}[,]]`.

**Examples:**
- "pink"
- "#204cfe" (Elgato blue)
- "0:#ff0000,0.5:yellow,1:#00ff00" (Gradient)

bar_border_c.description:
Border color represented as a named color, or hexadecimal value. Default is `white`.

**Examples:**
- "pink"
- "#204cfe" (Elgato blue)
bar_border_c.markdownDescription:
Border color represented as a named color, or hexadecimal value. Default is `white`.

**Examples:**
- "pink"
- "#204cfe" (Elgato blue)

bar_fill_c.description:
Fill color of the bar represented as a named color, hexadecimal value, or gradient. Default is `white`. Gradients can be defined by specifying multiple color-stops separated by commas, in the following format `[{offset}:{color}[,]]`.

**Examples:**
- "pink"
- "#204cfe" (Elgato blue)
- "0:#ff0000,0.5:yellow,1:#00ff00" (Gradient)
bar_fill_c.markdownDescription:
Fill color of the bar represented as a named color, hexadecimal value, or gradient. Default is `white`. Gradients can be defined by specifying multiple color-stops separated by commas, in the following format `[{offset}:{color}[,]]`.

**Examples:**
- "pink"
- "#204cfe" (Elgato blue)
- "0:#ff0000,0.5:yellow,1:#00ff00" (Gradient)

border_w.description: Width of the border around the bar, as a whole number. Default is `2`.
border_w.markdownDescription: Width of the border around the bar, as a whole number. Default is `2`.

range.description: Defines the range of the value the bar represents, e.g. 0-20, 0-100, etc.
range.markdownDescription: Defines the range of the value the bar represents, e.g. 0-20, 0-100, etc.

subtype.description:
Sub-type used to determine the type of bar to render. Default is  {@link  BarSubType.Groove }  (4).

**Options**
- Rectangle (0)
- DoubleRectangle (1)
- Trapezoid (2)
- DoubleTrapezoid (3)
- Groove (4)
subtype.markdownDescription:
Sub-type used to determine the type of bar to render. Default is  {@link  BarSubType.Groove }  (4).

**Options**
- Rectangle (0)
- DoubleRectangle (1)
- Trapezoid (2)
- DoubleTrapezoid (3)
- Groove (4)

value.description: Value used to determine how much of the bar is filled. Correlates with the item's `range` if specified in the layout's JSON definition; default range is `0..100`.
value.markdownDescription: Value used to determine how much of the bar is filled. Correlates with the item's `range` if specified in the layout's JSON definition; default range is `0..100`.

background.description:
Background color represented as a named color, hexadecimal value, or gradient. Gradients can be defined by specifying multiple color-stops separated by commas, in the following format `[{offset}:{color}[,]]`.

**Examples:**
- "pink"
- "#204cfe" (Elgato blue)
- "0:#ff0000,0.5:yellow,1:#00ff00" (Gradient)
background.markdownDescription:
Background color represented as a named color, hexadecimal value, or gradient. Gradients can be defined by specifying multiple color-stops separated by commas, in the following format `[{offset}:{color}[,]]`.

**Examples:**
- "pink"
- "#204cfe" (Elgato blue)
- "0:#ff0000,0.5:yellow,1:#00ff00" (Gradient)

enabled.description: Determines whether the item is enabled (i.e. visible); default is `true`.
enabled.markdownDescription: Determines whether the item is enabled (i.e. visible); default is `true`.

opacity.description: Defines the opacity of the item being shown based on a single-decimal value ranging from `0..1`, e.g. `0.1`, `0.2`, etc. with `0` being invisible and `1` being fully visible. Default is `1`.
opacity.markdownDescription: Defines the opacity of the item being shown based on a single-decimal value ranging from `0..1`, e.g. `0.1`, `0.2`, etc. with `0` being invisible and `1` being fully visible. Default is `1`.

zOrder.description: Z-order of the item, used to layer items within a layout; must be between 0-700. Items with the same `zOrder` must **not** have an overlapping `rect`. Default is `0`.
zOrder.markdownDescription: Z-order of the item, used to layer items within a layout; must be between 0-700. Items with the same `zOrder` must **not** have an overlapping `rect`. Default is `0`.

bar.description: Extended information used to define a layout item within a layout's JSON file.
bar.markdownDescription: Extended information used to define a layout item within a layout's JSON file.

key.description: Unique name used to identify the layout item. When calling `setFeedback` this value should be used as the key as part of the object that represents the feedback.
key.errorMessage: String must only contain alphanumeric characters (A-z, 0-9), hyphens (-), and underscores (_)
key.markdownDescription: Unique name used to identify the layout item. When calling `setFeedback` this value should be used as the key as part of the object that represents the feedback.

rect.description: Array defining the items coordinates in the format `[x, y, width, height]`; coordinates must be within canvas size of 200 x 100, e.g. [0, 0, 200, 100]. Items with the same `zOrder` must **not** have an overlapping `rect`.
rect.markdownDescription: Array defining the items coordinates in the format `[x, y, width, height]`; coordinates must be within canvas size of 200 x 100, e.g. [0, 0, 200, 100]. Items with the same `zOrder` must **not** have an overlapping `rect`.

type.description: Type of layout item this instance represents, e.g. "pixmap", "bar", etc.
type.markdownDescription: Type of layout item this instance represents, e.g. "pixmap", "bar", etc.

bar_h.description: Height of the bar's indicator. Default is `10`.
bar_h.markdownDescription: Height of the bar's indicator. Default is `10`.

bar_bg_c.description:
Bar background color represented as a named color, hexadecimal value, or gradient. Default is `darkGray`. Gradients can be defined by specifying multiple color-stops separated by commas, in the following format `[{offset}:{color}[,]]`.

**Examples:**
- "pink"
- "#204cfe" (Elgato blue)
- "0:#ff0000,0.5:yellow,1:#00ff00" (Gradient)

range.markdownDescription: Defines the range of the value the bar represents, e.g. 0-20, 0-100, etc.

Sub-type used to determine the type of bar to render. Default is  {@link  BarSubType.Groove }  (4).

**Options**
- Rectangle (0)
- DoubleRectangle (1)
- Trapezoid (2)
- DoubleTrapezoid (3)
- Groove (4)

gbar.markdownDescription: Extended information used to define a layout item within a layout's JSON file.

key.description: Unique name used to identify the layout item. When calling `setFeedback` this value should be used as the key as part of the object that represents the feedback.
key.errorMessage: String must only contain alphanumeric characters (A-z, 0-9), hyphens (-), and underscores (_)
key.markdownDescription: Unique name used to identify the layout item. When calling `setFeedback` this value should be used as the key as part of the object that represents the feedback.

rect.description: Array defining the items coordinates in the format `[x, y, width, height]`; coordinates must be within canvas size of 200 x 100, e.g. [0, 0, 200, 100]. Items with the same `zOrder` must **not** have an overlapping `rect`.
rect.markdownDescription: Array defining the items coordinates in the format `[x, y, width, height]`; coordinates must be within canvas size of 200 x 100, e.g. [0, 0, 200, 100]. Items with the same `zOrder` must **not** have an overlapping `rect`.

type.description: Type of layout item this instance represents, e.g. "pixmap", "bar", etc.
type.markdownDescription: Type of layout item this instance represents, e.g. "pixmap", "bar", etc.

value.description:
Image to render; this can be either a path to a local file within the plugin's folder, a base64 encoded `string` with the mime type declared (e.g. PNG, JPEG, etc.), or an SVG `string`.

**Examples:**
- "imgs/Logo.png"
- "data:image/svg+xml;base64,PHN2ZyB4bWxucz0iaHR0cDovL3d3dy53My5vcmcvMjAwMC9zdmciIHdpZHRoPSI1MHB0IiBoZWlnaHQ9…"
value.markdownDescription:
Image to render; this can be either a path to a local file within the plugin's folder, a base64 encoded `string` with the mime type declared (e.g. PNG, JPEG, etc.), or an SVG `string`.

**Examples:**
- "imgs/Logo.png"
- "data:image/svg+xml;base64,PHN2ZyB4bWxucz0iaHR0cDovL3d3dy53My5vcmcvMjAwMC9zdmciIHdpZHRoPSI1MHB0IiBoZWlnaHQ9…"

Background color represented as a named color, hexadecimal value, or gradient. Gradients can be defined by specifying multiple color-stops separated by commas, in the following format `[{offset}:{color}[,]]`.

**Examples:**
- "pink"
- "#204cfe" (Elgato blue)
- "0:#ff0000,0.5:yellow,1:#00ff00" (Gradient)

enabled.markdownDescription: Determines whether the item is enabled (i.e. visible); default is `true`.

opacity.description: Defines the opacity of the item being shown based on a single-decimal value ranging from `0..1`, e.g. `0.1`, `0.2`, etc. with `0` being invisible and `1` being fully visible. Default is `1`.
opacity.markdownDescription: Defines the opacity of the item being shown based on a single-decimal value ranging from `0..1`, e.g. `0.1`, `0.2`, etc. with `0` being invisible and `1` being fully visible. Default is `1`.

zOrder.description: Z-order of the item, used to layer items within a layout; must be between 0-700. Items with the same `zOrder` must **not** have an overlapping `rect`. Default is `0`.
zOrder.markdownDescription: Z-order of the item, used to layer items within a layout; must be between 0-700. Items with the same `zOrder` must **not** have an overlapping `rect`. Default is `0`.

pixmap.description: Extended information used to define a layout item within a layout's JSON file.
pixmap.markdownDescription: Extended information used to define a layout item within a layout's JSON file.

key.description: Unique name used to identify the layout item. When calling `setFeedback` this value should be used as the key as part of the object that represents the feedback.
key.errorMessage: String must only contain alphanumeric characters (A-z, 0-9), hyphens (-), and underscores (_)
key.markdownDescription: Unique name used to identify the layout item. When calling `setFeedback` this value should be used as the key as part of the object that represents the feedback.

rect.description: Array defining the items coordinates in the format `[x, y, width, height]`; coordinates must be within canvas size of 200 x 100, e.g. [0, 0, 200, 100]. Items with the same `zOrder` must **not** have an overlapping `rect`.
rect.markdownDescription: Array defining the items coordinates in the format `[x, y, width, height]`; coordinates must be within canvas size of 200 x 100, e.g. [0, 0, 200, 100]. Items with the same `zOrder` must **not** have an overlapping `rect`.

type.description: Type of layout item this instance represents, e.g. "pixmap", "bar", etc.
type.markdownDescription: Type of layout item this instance represents, e.g. "pixmap", "bar", etc.

alignment.description: Alignment of the text. Default is `"center"`. **Note**, when the `key` of this layout item is set to `"title"` within the layout's JSON definition, these values will be ignored in favour of the user's preferred title settings, as set in property inspector.
alignment.markdownDescription: Alignment of the text. Default is `"center"`. **Note**, when the `key` of this layout item is set to `"title"` within the layout's JSON definition, these values will be ignored in favour of the user's preferred title settings, as set in property inspector.

color.description:
Color of the font represented as a named color, or hexadecimal value. Default is `white`. **Note**, when the `key` of this layout item is set to `"title"` within the layout's JSON definition, these values will be ignored in favour of the user's preferred title settings, as set in property inspector.

**Examples:**
- "pink"
- "#204cfe" (Elgato blue)
color.markdownDescription:
Color of the font represented as a named color, or hexadecimal value. Default is `white`. **Note**, when the `key` of this layout item is set to `"title"` within the layout's JSON definition, these values will be ignored in favour of the user's preferred title settings, as set in property inspector.

**Examples:**
- "pink"
- "#204cfe" (Elgato blue)

size.description: Size of the font. **Note**, when the `key` of this layout item is set to `"title"` within the layout's JSON definition, this value will be ignored in favour of the user's preferred title settings, as set in property inspector.
size.markdownDescription: Size of the font. **Note**, when the `key` of this layout item is set to `"title"` within the layout's JSON definition, this value will be ignored in favour of the user's preferred title settings, as set in property inspector.

weight.description: Weight of the font; value must be a whole `number` in the range of `100..1000`. **Note**, when the `key` of this layout item is set to `"title"` within the layout's JSON definition, this value will be ignored in favour of the user's preferred title settings, as set in property inspector.
weight.markdownDescription: Weight of the font; value must be a whole `number` in the range of `100..1000`. **Note**, when the `key` of this layout item is set to `"title"` within the layout's JSON definition, this value will be ignored in favour of the user's preferred title settings, as set in property inspector.

font.description: Defines how the font should be rendered. **Note**, when the `key` of this layout item is set to `"title"` within the layout's JSON definition, these values will be ignored in favour of the user's preferred title settings, as set in property inspector.
font.markdownDescription: Defines how the font should be rendered. **Note**, when the `key` of this layout item is set to `"title"` within the layout's JSON definition, these values will be ignored in favour of the user's preferred title settings, as set in property inspector.

text-overflow.description:
Defines how overflowing text should be rendered on the layout.
- clip, truncates the text at the boundary of the element (default).
- ellipsis, truncates the text prior to the boundary of the element, and adds an ellipsis (…) to the end.
- fade, applies a fade-gradient over the end of the text.
text-overflow.markdownDescription:
Defines how overflowing text should be rendered on the layout.
- clip, truncates the text at the boundary of the element (default).
- ellipsis, truncates the text prior to the boundary of the element, and adds an ellipsis (…) to the end.
- fade, applies a fade-gradient over the end of the text.

Background color represented as a named color, hexadecimal value, or gradient. Gradients can be defined by specifying multiple color-stops separated by commas, in the following format `[{offset}:{color}[,]]`.

**Examples:**
- "pink"
- "#204cfe" (Elgato blue)
- "0:#ff0000,0.5:yellow,1:#00ff00" (Gradient)

**Examples:**

- "0:#ff0000,0.5:yellow,1:#00ff00" (Gradient)

enabled.markdownDescription: Determines whether the item is enabled (i.e. visible); default is `true`.

opacity.markdownDescription: Defines the opacity of the item being shown based on a single-decimal value ranging from `0..1`, e.g. `0.1`, `0.2`, etc. with `0` being invisible and `1` being fully visible. Default is `1`.

zOrder.description: Z-order of the item, used to layer items within a layout; must be between 0-700. Items with the same `zOrder` must **not** have an overlapping `rect`. Default is `0`.
zOrder.markdownDescription: Z-order of the item, used to layer items within a layout; must be between 0-700. Items with the same `zOrder` must **not** have an overlapping `rect`. Default is `0`.

text.description: Extended information used to define a layout item within a layout's JSON file.
